title.narrative: Increasing Economic Opportunities (Skills) for Marginalised Youth in Northern Nigeria; Mafita (Let's arise, opportunity is here)

description.narrative: This activity (Increasing Economic Opportunities (Skills) for Marginalised Youth in Northern Nigeria; Mafita (Let's arise, opportunity is here)) is a component of Increasing Economic Opportunities for Marginalised Youth in Northern Nigeria reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £23,071,437. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Basic life skills for youth and adults, Vocational training. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, AECOM. The start date is 20-04-2015 and the end date is 19-07-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Basic life skills for youth and adults

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - advanced technical and managerial training
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2019 Quarter 1
